description:
Each mission is tougher than the last as the Reapers` Game enters its second half. When a chance encounter shakes http://anidb.net/ch111127 [Shiki]`s confidence and motivation, it`s http://anidb.net/ch111128 [Neku]`s turn to support her for a change. Can he be a good enough partner to keep them alive?
Source: Funimation
